text: Densitometry of ECL immunoblots was performed using Gelworks ID intermediate software ( Ultraviolet Products , Cambridgeshire , UK ) .
Briefly , immunoblots were scanned and gates were drawn tightly around each band .
Background values from each lane were subtracted to normalize each measurement .
The bands were quantified using the Gelworks software .
All Western blots were exposed to film for varying lengths of time , and only films generating subsaturating levels of intensity were selected for densitometric evaluation .
